Sentencas: Y-doped BaZrO3 has been widely investigated as an electrolyte material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells, However, its poor sinterability and high grain boundary resistance are major barriers to its practical application.
Titulo: A facile method to fabricate proton-conducting BaZr0.85Y0.15O3-δ electrolyte with a large grain size and high conductivity

Sentencas: In the present research, large-grained and high-conductive BaZr0.85Y0.O-15(3-delta) (BZY15) electrolytes are fabricated via a facile method using Ba(NO3)(2) and (ZrO2)(0.92)(Y2O3)(0.)(08) as the starting materials.
Titulo: A facile method to fabricate proton-conducting BaZr0.85Y0.15O3-δ electrolyte with a large grain size and high conductivity

Sentencas: For comparison, BaCO3 and Ba(CH3COO)(2) are also used as Ba sources to prepare BZY15.
Titulo: A facile method to fabricate proton-conducting BaZr0.85Y0.15O3-δ electrolyte with a large grain size and high conductivity

Sentencas: Micro-analysis indicates that BZY15 powders with large particle sizes and a homogenous morphology could be obtained at very low temperature due to the liquid phase environment provided by Ba(NO3)(2).
Titulo: A facile method to fabricate proton-conducting BaZr0.85Y0.15O3-δ electrolyte with a large grain size and high conductivity

Sentencas: The Ba(NO3)(2)-derived pellet presents a homogeneous composition, in contrast to the Y segregation observed in the BaCO3- and Ba(CH3COO)(2)-derived pellets after sintering.
Titulo: A facile method to fabricate proton-conducting BaZr0.85Y0.15O3-δ electrolyte with a large grain size and high conductivity

Sentencas: Moreover, the widely used sintering aid, NiO, could further improve the sinterability and electrical properties of BZY15.
Titulo: A facile method to fabricate proton-conducting BaZr0.85Y0.15O3-δ electrolyte with a large grain size and high conductivity

Sentencas: The resulting BZY15 electrolyte shows a high conductivity of 3.9 x 10(-3) S cm(-1) at 600 degrees C.
Titulo: A facile method to fabricate proton-conducting BaZr0.85Y0.15O3-δ electrolyte with a large grain size and high conductivity
